data.title: Barberousse – The entire offer in the Quartier du Flon – Flon
data.text:
Rum bar

Barberousse

Barberousse is a bar specialized with rum where you can enjoy a laid back muical atmosphere. The bar's decoration reproduces an authentic hold of a pirate boat.

Cocktails with or without alcohol, snacks, animations and festive ambience, everything is set up to create a unforgettable pirate party.
